commits.summary: Disable indentation correction.

commits.summary: Use meta.embedded scope.

commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: Move folding settings.

commits.summary: Add readme.

commits.summary: Fix matching of quoted strings following a key.

commits.summary: Improve list-item matching, patch from Jacob Coby.

commits.summary: Limit the length of unquoted strings to lessen false positives. Patch from Jacob Coby.
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: Add command to convert a YAML document/selection to a new pretty-printed ruby document. Sent in by Rasmus Andersson.
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: Add syntax cheat sheet, sent in by Takaaki Kato.
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: Allow unquoted string items to start with an underscore, fixes ticket E24E9DBE.
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: In the YAML Bundle "Add list item" was using /usr/local/bin/ruby instead of /usr/bin/env ruby, which was FUBAR-ing the command for users with ruby installed at a different location.
commits.author: Benjamin Jackson

commits.body:
block: |
  block text ...

# comment


git-svn-id: http://svn.textmate.org/trunk/Bundles/YAML.tmbundle@7180 dfb7d73b-c2ec-0310-8fea-fb051d288c6d
commits.summary: Block quotes with comments in them as below were highlighting the comment as though it was block text. Also changed the scope name to include the .yaml so now it's string.unquoted.block.yaml.
commits.author: Benjamin Jackson

commits.body:
contactName:
   The full name of the contact for this bundle.
contactEmailRot13:
   A ROT13 encoded email address for the bundle contact (we obfuscate it to avoid spammers from picking up the files, seeing how bundles will often be available via anonymous svn over http).
description:
   A short description for this bundle. Do link to more info about the language (or whatever) the bundle is about. I decided on using HTML for this (but leave out the initial paragraph tag) since it seemed like overkill to run a single line of text through Markdown.pl, just to convert [foo](link) into <a href="link">foo</a>

Many of the current descriptions could use some improvements, I just wanted to get the ball rolling :)


git-svn-id: http://svn.textmate.org/trunk/Bundles/YAML.tmbundle@6718 dfb7d73b-c2ec-0310-8fea-fb051d288c6d
commits.summary: Add the following keys to the bundle’s info.plist:
commits.author: Allan Odgaard

commits.summary: Setting the default extension to "yaml" as suggested on the official website (yaml.org)
commits.author: David Bonnet

commits.summary: [NEW] Added command to YAML bundle to add a list item to an array. Right now it indents as expected for lines with keys, one-line array items and heredocs.
commits.author: Benjamin Jackson

commits.summary: Add optional newline match to comment.line to improve it's caret scoping.
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: • Lots of keyword.operator.symbol scopes changed. • Adding new punctuation scopes to various rules.
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: Add key binding to YAML sort command (F5)
commits.author: Duane Johnson

commits.summary: Add command to sort YAML keys alphabetically
commits.author: Duane Johnson

commits.summary: In my drunken stupor I left some constant.character.escape.untitled as I ran through the bundles, changing these to constant.character.escape.≪lang≫
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: Remove swallow use in favor of a constant.character.escape pattern.
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: Change entity.other.merge-key.yaml to keyword.operator.merge-key.yaml
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: • Change constant.date to constant.other.date • Change keyword.yaml to keyword.other.omap.yaml
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: Change variable.yaml to variable.other.yaml
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: Adding .yaml as a possible YAML file extension.
commits.author: James Edward Gray II

commits.summary: Tweak YAML syntax to better differntiate between numerics and unquoted strings
commits.author: David Powers

commits.summary: Cleanup of keyword.operator.symbol matching on :
commits.author: David Powers

commits.summary: Fix for YAML, missing ^ in backreference
commits.author: David Powers

commits.summary: Stretch the YAML grammar to cover arrays in the same way as keys
commits.author: David Powers

commits.summary: More experimental YAML fixes (clean up back reference key finding for array elements)
commits.author: David Powers

commits.summary: Experimental fixes to the YAML grammar to hopefully get more accurate highlighting
commits.author: David Powers

commits.summary: Commented lines with a colon in the text no longer start a code fold in YAML.
commits.author: Benjamin Jackson

commits.summary: • all single line comments, bullet points (plain text), and quoted lines (mail) now optionally match the newline character — this is so that when the caret is at the end of the line, the scope is still that of “the line.” This is so key equivalents bound to a given scope (like the ‘enter’ key) also work when typing at the end of the line, which would be expected.
commits.author: Allan Odgaard

commits.summary: • made comments its own entry (instead of part of the miscellaneous) • added additional comment variants for the languages which have them (that I am aware of, and have the bundle enabled)
commits.author: Allan Odgaard

commits.summary: • allow <% embedded %> ruby
commits.author: Allan Odgaard

commits.summary: • add comment character settings to YAML • remove preference for smart-typing pairs (since these were identical to the defaults)
commits.author: Allan Odgaard

commits.summary: [NEW] Added Indenting preferences to YAML bundle.
commits.author: Benjamin Jackson

commits.summary: [CHANGED] Changed key:value snippet to be triggered on ctr-: instead of :, as this was interfering with normal key/value entering.
commits.author: Benjamin Jackson

commits.summary: • add ctrl-shift-option Y as key equivalent
commits.author: Allan Odgaard

commits.summary: [NEW] First import of YAML bundle.
commits.author: Benjamin Jackson
